name: Import Select POP
description: The Import Select POP is used to import and load the geometry types primitives defined in USD COMP and FBX COMP. It essentially loads any geometry type that USD COMP or FBX COMP can support such as a Mesh, Points, NURBS Curves or Patches, Basis Curves. Each geometry represents one primitive from the loading file or it can be a set of primitives merged together for better performance. Where the geometry primitive types are not supportable by POPs, that are converted to triangles, quads, line strips and point primitives.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.label: Import Parent
parameters.description: Configure Import Parent for the operator

options.label: sRGB
options.description: sRGB color space, with sRGB transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: sRGB - Linear
options.description: Linear srgblinear - sRGB color space, with linear transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Rec.601 (NTSC)
options.description: Rec.601 with NTSC primaries color space, with Rec.601 transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Rec.709
options.description: Rec.709 color space, with Rec.709 (same as Rec.2020) transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Rec.2020
options.description: Rec.2020 color space, with Rec.2020 (same as Rec.709) transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: DCI-P3
options.description: P3 dcip3 - DCI-P3 color space, with D65 white point and 2.6 gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: DCI-P3 (D60)
options.description: P3 (D60) dcip3d60 - DCI-P3 "D60 sim" color space, with D60 white point, and 2.6 gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Display-P3 (D65)
options.description: P3 (D65) displayp3d65 - Display-P3 color space, with D65 white point, and sRGB gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: ACES2065-1
options.description: 1 aces2065-1 - ACES 2065-1 (also known as ACES AP0) color space, with a linear gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: ACEScg
options.description: ACEScg (also known as ACES AP1) color space, with a linear gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Passthrough
options.description: When selected, the color values will be used as-is in the operation, without any modification or attempt to convert them into the Working Color Space.

options.label: Default For Color Space
options.description: Will use either the SDR or the HDR Reference White, based on the color space selected.

options.label: Standard (SDR)
options.description: Will treat the Parameter Color Space as SDR for it's reference white value.

options.label: High (HDR)
options.description: Will treat the Parameter Color Space as HDR for it's reference white value.
